title: Untrainable
description: I want Hadley Holiday. In fact, I've been obsessed with her for months. But a good girl like her would never be with a scoundrel like me.My reputation is shot. Asking Hadley to fake a relationship with me to improve my image would be the easy way out, but it could ruin her. No thanks. I've got a better idea, and my plan will work perfectly as long as I can keep my hands to myself.I can be a good boy.Really, I can.Until I can't.Untrainable is a standalone romantic comedy in the Night Time Television Series.
author: Jamie Schlosser
